title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as the Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backends with LangChain abstractions.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode, OpenAI-compatible API).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal; supports themes, history, markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline code assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; synchronous & asynchronous APIs, streaming, embeddings.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed, async bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio and serde.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; supports chat, generate, embeddings, model management, and streaming via HttpClient.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cameroon
summary: Community-curated awesome list: tools, prompts, tutorials, and projects around the Ollama ecosystem.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama; cross-platform binaries for macOS/Linux/Windows.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker images and compose stacks (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama and optional web UI.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for summarizing notes, Q&A, and custom prompts inside your vault.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: LogSeq plugin to run local LLM prompts on blocks/pages using Ollama; supports slash commands and templates.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package distributing the ollama-js client; 20k+ weekly downloads, zero runtime dependencies.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for ollama-python; 100k+ monthly downloads, supports Python 3.8+.

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for discussing Ollama models, troubleshooting, benchmarks, and ecosystem announcements.
